initial_box.p: I am a web developer focused on frontend, I also have knowledge in backend. I love technology and study continuously, always looking to learn what's new. I have a degree in Arts and Design from UFJF and I have a degree in Cinema and Audiovisual from the same institution.

hidrofobia_modal.title: Hidrofobia
hidrofobia_modal.about: Hidrofobia is a website developed with the purpose of promoting the film that I produced and directed. Not just publicizing, but being a means of raising funds for the film's production through a personalized and exclusive form integrated with Google Forms. In this project there is also a gallery of behind-the-scenes photos from the recording days.

somuuh_modal.title: Somuuh
somuuh_modal.about: Somuuh is a social network project focused on working with authentication and design. Exploring references such as Instagram, Twitter and Spotify.

notein_modal.title: NoteIn
notein_modal.about: NoteIn is a project in which I focused on working with authentication with a non-real database (mongoDB)

pokedex_modal.title: Pokedex
pokedex_modal.about: Pokedex is a project that aims to bring together all the pokemons in one place, with their information, such as abilities (in bars) and images

todo_modal.title: ToDo
todo_modal.about: ToDo is a web application that seeks to store items defined by the user in the browser, mark them as completed or even remove them. React, Next.js, LocalStorage, Typescript and SASS were used.

compare_modal.title: Compare
compare_modal.about: Compare is an application that compares a list of followers of a user on github with the list of people that this user follows, generating two other lists: that of users that the current user follows but does not follow him back, and that of users that the current user does not follow but follow him. Generating a link for each user profile in these two lists, allowing you to follow or unfollow users

about.about_1: I am a person who loves technology and always seeks to learn the newest tools to shape my ideas, trying to meet personal and others' needs. I graduated in Arts and Design from the Federal University of Juiz de Fora and in Cinema and Audiovisual, also at UFJF.
about.about_2: My education provides me, in addition to all the artistic and theoretical knowledge in these areas, with a repertoire rich in innovative and interactive ideas, bringing to my projects a conceptual and theoretical complexity that, combined with the development process, adds some extra layers to my work, making what I produce truly unique and exclusive.
about.about_3: I started programming in 2019, and since then, I have been in constant learning about everything that arouses my curiosity. I began by developing simple websites with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and today, I can create something more complex using React, Next.js, Typescript, and other frontend tools.
about.about_4: Although I focus a lot on frontend, I can also develop CRUDs with Node and Express and manipulate data in databases (MySql and MongoDB). Some of my projects are experiments where I integrate frontend with backend, seeking to understand more about concepts and best practices.

box_course_webModerno.title: Complete Modern Web Course - Udemy
box_course_webModerno.description: In this course, I learned about Javascript, Web Concepts, HTML and CSS, Ajax Webpack, jQuery, Bootstrap, React, VueJs, Electron, Angular 9, Database (relational and NoSQL) and Express.

box_course_biArts.title: Interdisciplinary Bachelor's Degree in Arts and Design | UFJF
box_course_biArts.description: Graduated in Arts and Design from UFJF, I had contact with the areas of Design, Cinema and Audiovisual, Fashion, and Visual Arts. During this period, I absorbed content related to the arts and their reverberations.

box_course_biCinema.title: Bachelor's Degree in Cinema and Audiovisual | UFJF
box_course_biCinema.description: As a Cinema and Audiovisual student I have knowledge about screenwriting, montage and editing (of videos/films), film theory, among others. I have already produced some audiovisual content and films.I directed and produced the short film Hidrofobia.
